Html:
It seems there is a problem with "european" numbers, where floating point numbers are separated by a , and not a .
When reading OADates an error occurs at ExcelOpenXmlReader.cs
double.TryParse(o.ToString(), out number))
If I change it to double.TryParse(o.ToString().Replace('.',','), out number)) all works correct.

There was a recent fix for this. Please try the latest source from the repo.

Regards
Ian
